item.title: TOBOX Release Party Special Site
item.description: 赤帯 ©unexpected bowtie For me, he is the one who gave me the opportunity to know about Commodore 64 and has been very helpful with the history of chiptune and many helpful articles, translations and information… One of my influences as a digger! SID Media Lab SoundCloud SoundCloud MixCloud note うみのひやけ He is a roadside chiptuner who has been active in GAMEBOY since the dawn of chiptune, and since his music was played at the VGMDJ event 88nite, I wanted to invite him to join us!

item.title: Works
